message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're looking to negotiate, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1050000. This is a significant concession from my initial offer, but I believe it's still a good value considering the product's worth to you.
